Identification.LongTitle: Order Specifying Certain Waters on the Sea Coasts of Canada as Minor Waters

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Minor Waters Order.
The following sheltered waters on the sea coasts of Canada are hereby specified as minor waters of Canada:

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: Alberni Inlet and the eastern channel of Barclay Sound as far west as Bamfield Inlet,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: Quatsino Sound and all waters connected therewith as far west as Koprino Harbour,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: False Creek, Vancouver, east of Burrard Bridge,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: Jervis Inlet inside a line drawn between Thunder Point and Ball Point and all waters connected therewith not seaward of Fox Island in Telescope passage, including the Agamemnon Channel and Pender Harbour inside a line drawn between Fearney Point and Moore Point, and

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: Prince Rupert Harbour as far south as Charles Point;

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: Saint John Harbour inside the southern breakwater and inside a line drawn between the southern extremity of the northern breakwater and the most easterly point of Partridge Island,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: Shediac Harbour westward of a line drawn between Pointe du Chêne and Caissie Point,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: Miramichi Bay westward of a line drawn from the eastern shore of Neguac Beach to the eastern shores of Portage and Fox Islands and thence to the western point of Preston Beach,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: Nepisiquit Bay inside a line drawn between Alston and Carron Points,

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: Dalhousie Harbour and the Restigouche River westward of a line drawn from Maguacha Point in the Province of Quebec to the mouth of Charlo River,

Subparagraph.Label: (vi)
Subparagraph.Text: Shippigan Sound inside the breakwater at Shippigan Gulley and south of a line drawn between Grasse Point and Pokesudi Point,

Subparagraph.Label: (vii)
Subparagraph.Text: Miscou Harbour east of a line drawn between Herring Point and Mya Point, and

Subparagraph.Label: (viii)
Subparagraph.Text: Passamoquoddy Bay as far as Campobello Island and inside a line drawn at the northern entrance between east Quoddy Head and Deadman Head;

Provision.Text: Humber Arm, east of a line drawn from Frenchman’s Head triangulation station to McIver’s Point triangulation station;

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: Bras d’Or Lake, Great Bras d’Or and all waters connected therewith inside a line joining Carey and Noir Points, and northwards of the seaward end of St. Peters Canal,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: Annapolis Basin and Digby Gut inside a line between Prim Point lighthouse and Victoria Beach at the entrance to Digby Gut, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: Halifax Harbour and the waters inside a line joining the triangulation station on Osborne Head and the eastern extremity of Chebucto Head;

Provision.Text: Kugmallit Bay, south of a line drawn from the northern tip of the peninsula adjoining Kidluit Bay to Toker Point; and

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: Charlottetown Harbour inside Canseaux and Battery Points,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: Summerside Harbour inside a line between Phelan Point and Indian Head Breakwater, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: Cardigan Bay inside a line drawn between Panmure Head and Red Point.
